# `AgentScheduleShiftActivity` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| activityCategory | `string` | Yes | The activity category for which the agent is scheduled |
| startOffsetMinutes | `number` | Yes | The start offset of the activity, relative to referenceStartDate at the top level |
| lengthMinutes | `number` | Yes | The length of the activity in minutes |
